title: Cisco Identity Intelligence - Failed Checks
description: This dashboard provides information about the Failed Checks generated on Cisco Identity Intelligence(OORT).

definition.content:
Gain better visibility into your organization's security events by monitoring Cisco Identity Intelligence (OORT) Failed Check logs with this dashboard. 

Cisco Identity Intelligence, formerly known as Oort, is an identity provider application that offers advanced security features for managing user identities and access across an organization's network. It enables organizations to authenticate, authorize, and monitor user access to applications and resources efficiently. Cisco Identity Intelligence (Oort) helps organizations strengthen their security posture by providing robust identity and access management functionalities to protect against unauthorized access and security threats.

For Further reading, see:

- [Cisco Identity Intelligence (OORT) - Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/cisco_identity_intelligence)

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates Failed Checks logs to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](https://app.datadoghq.com/security?query=source%3Acisco-identity-intelligence%20&agg_m=count&agg_m_source=base&agg_t=count&column=time&fromUser=false&order=desc&start=1722941024113&end=1723027424113&paused=false).
